description:
<U+201C>Estimate<U+201D>, i.e. compute approximately the CONDition number of
a (potentially large, often sparse) matrix A.
It works by apply a fast randomized approximation of the 1-norm,
norm(A,"1"), through onenormest(.).
example_call: onenormest(A, t = min(n, 5), A.x, At.x, n, silent = FALSE, quiet = silent,
